page.description: Opens the Define Arguments Dialog that lets you define arguments.

section.description: An argument is a value that is interpreted at run-time. Arguments can be used with SQL, DBF, and Custom data source types. This feature can be very useful in filtering data to generate reports and lists of filtered data. For more on this, watch these videos on [Understanding Array Arguments in Report Filters] and [Using Array Arguments with List Controls].
You can also designate that an argument is an array by pre-fixing the argument with an 'array_'.
